title: SCP-682-J James的彩画本
content:
[[module CSS]]

@import url(http://www.scp-wiki.net/component:scp-pride/code/1);

[[/module]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/231-1.png|caption=[数据杉除]|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/spacefrogs-1.png|caption=从邪惡马桶出来的太空青蛙]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/wat.png|caption=爸爸，别在我本子上画画!!!]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/hooks.png|caption=蜥蜴对着这些钩子快发疯了|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/bestfriends-1.png|caption=好朋友]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/682%20017.png|caption= 黑黑东西很害怕|width=400px|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/682999-c.png|caption=詹姆斯，作为你的父亲我必须告诉你，你的一些画根本就不合乎逻辑|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/EYESONHISTOSE.png|caption=它把眼睛长满了全身]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/girls.png|caption=不可能！这样太傻了！你撒谎！|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki-cn.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/qCT7E.png|caption=我最好的朋友在喝下午茶|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/682.png|caption=然後他像牛仔那樣騎著最超級大蜥蜴！|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/Scp079x682%3DBRO-OTP.png|caption=永远最好的朋友！！|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/Scp-___-j.png|caption=我的宠物阿石！！！|align=right]]

[[include component:image-block    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/doesn't682lookskindaliketheguyin87-b.jpg|    caption=[[size 130%]]超[[/size]]级怪异的糖[[size 130%]]果[[/size]]几做出一个跳舞的傻蜥蜴]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/ablevs682.png|caption=儿子你真有这个的足够权限等级吗？|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/BEST%20LIZERD%20EVER.png|caption=超[[size 130%]]吵吖[[/size]]子无[[size 130%]]法打[[/size]]倒[[size 150%]]史上最棒的蜥蜴[[/size]]]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/pencilmadness_image0.jpg|caption=2只蜥易]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/IMG_0525.JPG|caption=躲[[size 130%]]不了[[/size]][[size 150%]]史上最棒的蜥蜴[[/size]]|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/IMG_0253[1].JPG|caption=把拔看我画的更好了谢谢橘局人！|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/IMG_0528.JPG|caption=儿子，那真棒。然而你的文法糟透了。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/093682j.png|caption=[[size 130%]]最棒蜥蜴大战屎屎巨人[[/size]]|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/other.png|caption=蜥蜴打篮球|align=right]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-682-j-james-coloring-book/highaltitudedrop.png|caption=基金汇的人把蜥蜴从天上扔下去|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=https://i.ibb.co/s658Xzz/containment-breach.jpg|caption=蜥蜴先生生汽的时后|align=right]]
author: Letitia213
